tool.name: One SNP Away
tool.description: Finds residues that are one SNP away from input amino acid
tool.help:
One SNP Away ============
Given a DNA FASTA sequence and a one letter amino acid code, this tool will output the translated sequence and denote the residues that are one single nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) away from the input amino acid.
To check SNPs to Stop codons, input Stop in the Amino Acid field.
